article: the rear car of a southbound a train derailed in a subway tunnel in harlem on thursday night as the train passed through the ###th street station at st. nicholas avenue , injuring ## people , knocking over support pillars in the station and twisting the rear car into a jumbled wreck of sheared metal , police and fire officials said .
